channel.title: Client compiler
channel.description:
If I'm trying to compile it says: 'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
Compiler edit: @echo off Javac -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java pause
Thank you :)

item.title: Client compiler
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

find where you downloaded java jdk in your program files mostlikely then copy and paste the location like this

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe”
or this
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe”

so your compiler looks like

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\java\jdkversion\bin\javac.exe” -cp ./bin/ ./src/*.java
pause

or you could just set environmental variables

Read full topic

item.title: Client compiler

item.description:
@RixBoy wrote:

If I’m trying to compile it says:
‘Javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.

pause
